title: Daniwahyu007
author: Daniwahyu007
content: INNOVATOR CHAIN (INOV8)INNOVATOR adalah perintis ekosistem blockchain yang dirancang aman untukperusahaan dan pengembang yang ingin memasuki dunia blockchain.INNOVATOR menawarkan titik masuk yang aman dan efisien ke duniablockchain untuk penggunanya, memberdayakan penggunanya untuk memanfaatkan manfaat transformatifdari teknologi ini.INNOVATOR bukan hanya sekedar blockchain. Ini adalah sebuah Inovasi baru.Pengembang dapat memanfaatkan opsi pendanaan untuk meluncurkan proyek mereka dichain (rantai), memberi mereka solusi ramah lingkungan dan berkelanjutan. Oleh sebab itu,Dengan melakukan hal tersebut INNOVATOR mendukung pengembangan berbasis aplikasi blockchaindan layanan, menjadikannya platform ideal untuk dibawa oleh pengembang dan membuatide-ide mereka menjadi kenyataan.Produk & Utilitas MendatangPertukaran TerdesentralisasiPembuat Pasar OtomatisLayanan Bridging & ExplorerDompet TerintegrasiTeknologi Pasar NFT & SaaS Defi Marketplace (Defi Shopify)Landasan PeluncuranTokenomicsNama: InnovatorTicker: INOV8Algoritma: Nominated Proof of Stake (NPoS)Block time: 6 DetikEpoch (Masa): 3 JamERA: 6 JamInflasi: Ideal 10%Tanggal Rilis: Pada Akhir November 2023Substrat: EVM: Full EVM Substrate /Solidity compatiblePremine: 20 Juta INOV8Lisensi Validator Innovator saat ini tersedia di https://innovatorchain.com27 Lisensi telah terjual.. harga naik per lisensi - saat ini masing-masing 0,25eBlockchain Mainnet diluncurkan pada akhir November 2023.Tautan & Media Website: https://innovatorchain.com App: https://app.innovatorchain.com (under development) Testnet Explorer: https://devexplorer.innovatorchain.com/ Medium: https://medium.com/@innovatorchain Reddit: https://reddit.com/r/innovatorchain/ Whitepaper: https://innovatorchain.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/INNOVATOR-Whitepaper-V4.pdf Akun Media Sosial  Discord: https://discord.innovatorchain.com Telegram: https://t.me/Innovator_chain Twitter: https://twitter.com/INNOVATORCHAINSaya seorang penerjemah dan tidak ada hubungannya dengan proyek ini, postingan ini hanya untuk tujuan informasi, BUKAN rekomendasi keuangan. DYORThread bahasa Inggris asli ada di sini - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5474339.0Untuk pertanyaan penting, silakan hubungi tim secara langsung - marketing@innovatorchain.com

comments.author: ovladmirs
comments.body: Good morning all,Innovator is set to launch its INOV8 token vesting round. This unique opportunity allows users to be a part of the Innovator blockchain, offering a novel approach to token acquisition and value.Starting on Friday 15th December anyone wishing to participate will be able to buy directly from the Innovator app with Ethereum. app.innovatorchain.com/presale and once the presale tokens are purchased, tokens will be vested over a period of 6 months on the chain with the real INOV8 tokens and for those who purchased a bit of OTC, your vesting period will also start on Friday. One thing to mention is we still have some early tokens to sell up until the presale contract goes live so PM us if you want to acquire some at an early discounted price of 5cThis vesting round is an innovative pricing strategy. The starting price of the INOV8 token is pegged at a modest 0.000025 Ethereum, equivalent to $0.056 as of now. However, with each purchase of 50,000 INOV8 tokens, the price is designed to increase by one Ethereum digit. This structure ensures a gradual and steady climb in the token's early participation. The anticipation is that by the time 4 million tokens are purchased and vested, the price per token will have escalated to an impressive $0.23c.During the time of the vesting period, users can still stake their tokens on validators earning them some extra INOV8 whilst still in the vesting period, and can redeem tokens that have already been released on the scheduled block releases, In a bid to ensure stability and long-term commitment, the tokens are released per block every 6 seconds over a six-month period. This methodical release schedule aims to prevent market flooding and maintain the token's value integrity.Allocation of Raised FundsThe allocation of funds raised through this vesting round is strategically planned. A substantial 50% of the funds will be channelled into creating liquidity for the INOV8 token, enhancing its market presence and stability. Additionally, 30% of the proceeds are earmarked for marketing, brand awareness and team building, crucial for the token's visibility and appeal in a crowded market. The remaining 20% will be used for infrastructure and running costs, ensuring the smooth operation and sustainability of the Innovator ecosystem.Participants in the INOV8 token vesting round are not just investing in a digital asset; they are becoming part of an ecosystem set to thrive with unique utilities, 3rd party projects and opportunities to join a blockchain from the early stages. Thanks Innovator Team

comments.author: ovladmirs

With a unique pricing strategy, the token's value increases with each 50,000 INOV8 purchased, promising a climb to $0.24 by the end of the presale as of today‚Äôs Ethereum price.Presale Links: https://app.innovatorchain.com/presale
